items.name: Dhow Builders Workshop & Museum
items.short_description: Explore the ancient craft of dhow building with interactive exhibits, miniature models, and live demonstrations of traditional shipbuilding techniques.
items.address: Waterfront, near Lamu Fort, Lamu Old Town

items.name: Swahili Kids' Kitchen & Crafts
items.short_description: A hands-on museum where children learn to prepare simple Swahili dishes, create traditional pottery, and weave with local materials.
items.address: Peponi Road, Shela Village

items.name: Lamu Marine Life Discovery Center
items.short_description: Dive into the underwater world of Lamu with interactive exhibits, touch tanks, and educational displays about local fish, corals, and marine conservation.
items.address: Front Street, Lamu Old Town

items.name: Donkey Sanctuary & Heritage Hub
items.short_description: Learn about the vital role of donkeys in Lamu's history and daily life. Kids can help with donkey care and explore traditional tools.
items.address: Donkey Sanctuary Lane, Lamu Old Town

items.name: Jua the Dhow's Crew Meet-up
items.short_description: Meet Jua, the friendly dhow, and her cheerful crew of sea-faring cartoon characters for fun photo opportunities and sing-alongs.
items.address: Along the Jetty, Lamu Old Town

items.name: Pili the Parrot's Pirate Party
items.short_description: Join Pili, the colorful Lamu parrot, and her pirate friends for a lively meet-and-greet filled with games and pirate tales.
items.address: Shela Beach, near Peponi Hotel

items.name: Mzee Kasa's Coral Friends
items.short_description: Meet Mzee Kasa, the wise old sea turtle, and his vibrant coral reef friends. Learn about marine life and snap memorable photos.
items.address: Manda Beach, Manda Island

items.name: Donkey Tales with Dunda
items.short_description: Encounter Dunda, the friendly Lamu donkey character, for storytelling sessions and gentle interactions that highlight the island's unique culture.
items.address: Lamu Old Town Square (near the Fort)

items.name: Beach Olympics Playground
items.short_description: A vibrant mini-arena on Shela beach offering scaled-down versions of beach volleyball, football, and creative sandcastle-building competitions.
items.address: Shela Public Beach, Shela Village

items.name: Dhow Race Simulator Challenge
items.short_description: Experience the thrill of a traditional dhow race through an engaging virtual reality simulator, complete with interactive rowing and sailing challenges.
items.address: Utukufu Street, Lamu Old Town

items.name: Coconut Tree Climb & Swing
items.short_description: A safe and exhilarating area for kids to try guided coconut tree climbing and enjoy swings fashioned from natural materials.
items.address: Near Kizingoni Beach, Lamu East

items.name: Old Town Alleyway Games
items.short_description: A series of traditional Swahili street games adapted for children, set within a charming replica of Lamu's narrow alleyways.
items.address: Kenyatta Road, Lamu Old Town

items.name: Sultan's Secret Garden
items.short_description: Wander through a lush, enchanted garden inspired by Swahili royalty tales, featuring hidden nooks, mystical statues, and whispering fountains.
items.address: Behind Lamu Fort, Lamu Old Town

items.name: Coral Kingdom Maze
items.short_description: Navigate an exciting, immersive maze themed as an underwater coral kingdom, populated by friendly characters from local marine legends.
items.address: Manda Island, near Manda Bay

items.name: The Whispering Baobab Grove
items.short_description: Discover an enchanting grove of ancient baobab trees, where hidden sound installations share age-old Lamu stories and fables.
items.address: Just outside Shela Village, towards the dunes

items.name: Genie's Bottle Island
items.short_description: An imaginative mini-island playground inspired by Arabian Nights and local genie stories, featuring whimsical structures and water play areas.
items.address: Floating platform near Lamu Waterfront

items.name: Star Sailors Dome
items.short_description: A captivating dome experience focused on how dhow sailors navigated by the stars, exploring constellations and celestial myths relevant to coastal cultures.
items.address: Lamu Fort grounds, Lamu Old Town

items.name: Moonlit Mangrove Observatory
items.short_description: An open-air observatory offering simple telescope viewing sessions of the moon and stars, complemented by local legends about the night sky.
items.address: Near Manda Toto, Manda Island

items.name: Constellation Corner
items.short_description: A cozy, inflatable planetarium dome for younger children, presenting basic star shows and engaging stories about the brightest constellations.
items.address: Shela Village Community Hall, Shela

items.name: Dhow Navigator's Stargazing Deck
items.short_description: An elevated deck offering guided stargazing sessions with binoculars and telescopes, focusing on cultural astronomy and traditional navigation.
items.address: Top floor of a building near the waterfront, Lamu Old Town

items.name: Lamu Living Reef Exhibit
items.short_description: A vibrant aquarium showcasing the diverse marine life of Lamu's coral reefs, with interactive displays on local fish species and their habitats.
items.address: Front Street, near Lamu Museum, Lamu Old Town

items.name: Turtle Hatchery & Rescue
items.short_description: Visit a dedicated center for sea turtle conservation, observe rescued turtles, and learn about the local turtle hatching programs.
items.address: Shela Beach, towards the north end

items.name: Mangrove Wonders Tank
items.short_description: Discover the unique ecosystem of Lamu's mangroves through specialized tanks showcasing fish, crustaceans, and other creatures that thrive there.
items.address: Near Manda Island Jetty, Manda Island

items.name: Seahorse Lagoon
items.short_description: A captivating exhibit dedicated to the delicate beauty of seahorses, featuring various local species in meticulously recreated habitats.
items.address: Along the Main Pier, Lamu Old Town

items.name: Bustani ya Hadithi (Garden of Tales)
items.short_description: An enchanting outdoor amphitheater where local storytellers share traditional Swahili myths, legends, and fables under the shade of ancient trees.
items.address: Near the Old Town Market, Lamu Old Town

items.name: The Baobab of Wisdom
items.short_description: Gather around a majestic baobab tree for immersive storytelling sessions, where ancient tales of wisdom and adventure come alive.
items.address: On the path between Lamu and Shela

items.name: Dhow Legends Lakeside
items.short_description: Experience captivating stories of the sea and legendary dhow journeys, told by master storytellers either on a traditional dhow or by a serene waterside setting.
items.address: Waterfront Park, Lamu Old Town

items.name: Island Lore Lagoon
items.short_description: Explore an interactive park setting where pressing buttons or activating sensors triggers short, engaging stories about Lamu's unique island myths and history.
items.address: Manda Island, near the beach resorts

items.name: Dhow Adventure Playground
items.short_description: A themed playground featuring structures shaped like traditional dhows, climbing nets like rigging, and vast sandpits for creative play.
items.address: Shela Beachfront, Shela Village

items.name: Donkey Trail Challenge
items.short_description: An engaging mini-obstacle course designed for kids, mimicking the paths and challenges of Lamu's donkey routes, with safe climbing and balance elements.
items.address: Behind Lamu Museum, Lamu Old Town

items.name: Mangrove Climb & Slide
items.short_description: A unique adventure playground with structures resembling mangrove roots, interconnected by slides, swings, and rope bridges for exploration.
items.address: Manda Bay Beach, Manda Island

items.name: Lamu Fort Fun Zone
items.short_description: An exciting adventure playground located near the historic Lamu Fort, featuring climbing walls, slides, and towers inspired by its ancient architecture.
items.address: Grounds adjacent to Lamu Fort, Lamu Old Town

items.name: The Sultan's Lost Treasure Hunt
items.short_description: Embark on an epic treasure hunt through the winding alleys of Lamu Old Town, solving riddles and following clues to find the Sultan's lost riches.
items.address: Starts at Lamu Fort, Lamu Old Town

items.name: Dhow Captain's Compass Quest
items.short_description: A navigation-themed quest where kids learn to use a compass and map to find hidden points along the Lamu waterfront, discovering nautical secrets.
items.address: Starts at the Main Jetty, Lamu Old Town

items.name: Marine Mystery Eco-Quest
items.short_description: An educational adventure on Shela Beach, where teams solve environmental puzzles and challenges to uncover secrets of marine conservation.
items.address: Starts at Shela Beach entrance

items.name: Manda Island Explorer's Challenge
items.short_description: A guided quest across Manda Island, leading kids through historical sites and natural landscapes to complete challenges and learn about the island's past.
items.address: Starts at Manda Island Jetty

items.name: The Mystic Dhow Captain's Tricks
items.short_description: A captivating magic show where a 'dhow captain' performs illusions and magic tricks using nautical themes and traditional Lamu elements.
items.address: Lamu Waterfront Cultural Tent, Lamu Old Town

items.name: Swahili Sorcerer's Secrets
items.short_description: A unique magic and illusion show blending traditional Swahili storytelling with astonishing feats of magic, promising a cultural and magical experience.
items.address: Shela Community Hall, Shela Village

items.name: Desert Genie's Delights
items.short_description: A mesmerizing show featuring a 'desert genie' performing classic illusions with an Arabian Nights flair, filled with wonder and mystery.
items.address: Manda Island Resort Entertainment Area

items.name: Ocean Wonders Magic Show
items.short_description: Witness a magical spectacle inspired by the ocean, where illusions involve disappearing fish, conjured water, and other marine-themed wonders.
items.address: Near Lamu Museum Courtyard, Lamu Old Town
